import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button, Form } from 'react-bootstrap'; import Rating from '../components/Rating'; import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import productsa from '../products'; function ProductScreen({match}) { // Assuming you have a URL parameter named _id const {id}=useParams() const product=productsa.find((p)=>p._id===id) return (

) : ( Please sign in to write a review{' '} )} )}
); } export default ProductScreen;
